name: scenario_id
description: UUID for this specific scenario instance

name: test_run_id
description: UUID shared by all scenarios in one harness invocation

name: expected_detector
description: issue_id that should fire for this scenario. Null means no issues expected.

name: expected_position
description: Expected strategic_position: STRONG | MODERATE | WEAK | UNCERTAIN

name: intake_json
description: Full JSON-serialized intake object passed to buildCaseAnalysisReport

name: lease_details_json
description: JSON-serialized Gemini-extracted lease details (deposit amount, address, etc.)
